classes.documentation: Define a scenario by portfolio. Record can be create manually or by rebalance routine. Allow to store data for simulation tool. This file contain three kind of block. 1 - Security pre-orders. Proposed buying or selling orders. Generate SEC.OPEN.ORDER records on validate (F5) with verify function. 2 - Forex. Store forex for simulation tools. 3 - Inflow or Outflow. Store inflow or outflow for simulation tools. NOTES: Fields are named with "SC", "FX", "AC" depending of product plus "A" for active parts of transaction or "P" for passive parts of transaction.
classes.name: AM_SCENARIO

properties.documentation: Keyed on the session number and the portfolio number. Example : 7.100053-1 Validation Rules 1 42 alphanumeric characters Mandatory Input
properties.name: SCENARIO_CODE

properties.documentation: Scenario creation date. Updated by automatic proposed orders routines. Validation Rules No input.
properties.name: CREATION_DATE

properties.documentation: This field can be set to AUTO or MANUAL.
properties.name: CREATION_MODE

properties.documentation: The session number of the user or process that created this record.Part of the key to this record.
properties.name: SESSION

properties.documentation: The portfolio for which this scenario was created.Must be a valid entry in the SEC.ACC.MASTER table.
properties.name: SAM_CODE

properties.documentation: This field contains the total valuation of a portfolio. Validation Rules No input field. Automatically updated by the AM.REBALANCE routine whenever the rebalance is launched.
properties.name: SAM_VALUATION
en
properties.value: Indicates the User who Authorises the record

properties.name: en
properties.value: Date and time when record was audited

properties.documentation: Flag Yes/No. Define if block will be selected for generate order process or simulate process. Validation Rules Yes or No (default blank is No)
properties.name: SC_SELECTED

properties.documentation: Specifies the operator who is working on a Security block of the scenario. Validation Rules No input field Automatically updated
properties.name: SC_OPERATOR

properties.documentation: Flag Yes/No. Define if block will not be clear by SELL or BUY option in "clear.scenario" process. Validation Rules Yes or No (default blank is No)
properties.name: SC_LOCKED

properties.documentation: Define direction of pre-orders. Validation Rules Mandatory. BUY or SELL
properties.name: SC_DIRECTION

properties.documentation: The security to which this multi valued set applies.Must be a valid SECURITY.MASTER.
properties.name: SCA_SECURITY

properties.documentation: Securities currency Validation Rules No Input. Internally generated
properties.name: SCA_CURRENCY

properties.documentation: Securities price type. Validation Rules No Input. Internally generated
properties.name: SCA_PRICE_TYPE

properties.documentation: Nominal holding by customer in specify portfolio. Validation Rules No input.
properties.name: SCA_NOM_HELD

properties.documentation: This field has value consideration amt + interest amt , if accrued interest field of AM.PARAMETER is INCLUDE .If its EXCLUDE it has only consideration amt .
properties.name: SCA_AMT_HELD

properties.documentation: Specifies the nominal amount of the security. Store an override if violated securities trading units. Validation Rules Mandatory
properties.name: SCA_NOMINAL

properties.documentation: Price at which the order is created. Default is security master market price. Validation Rules Mandatory. 1 to 15 numeric characters.
properties.name: SCA_PRICE

properties.documentation: Amount valuation proposed by automatic rebalancing process. Validation Rules Internally generated.
properties.name: SC_PROPOSED_VAL

properties.documentation: Amount valuation calculated with market price, securities price type and nominal. Validation Rules Internally generated.
properties.name: SCA_VALUATION

properties.documentation: Specify the account over which the movement of the security in the transaction will be recorded. Validation Rules Must be a valid account number of the specify portfolio.
properties.name: SCP_ACCOUNT

properties.documentation: Account currency Validation Rules No Input. Internally generated
properties.name: SCP_CURRENCY

properties.documentation: Valuation of transaction. Validation Rules No input. Internally generated.
properties.name: SCP_VALUATION

properties.documentation: Exchange rate for conversion between security currency and settlement currency. Validation Rules Rate
properties.name: SC_EXCH_RATE

properties.documentation: A space delimited list of AM.VIOLATION s that apply to this proposed movement
properties.name: SC_VIOLATION

properties.documentation: This field is no longer used
properties.name: VIOL_LIST

properties.documentation: Notes input by the user.These will be automatically be copied over to the orders when they are placed.
properties.name: NOTES

properties.documentation: SEC.OPEN.ORDER identifier. Populate when generate open orders. Validation Rules No input. Internally generated.
properties.name: SC_ORDER

properties.documentation: Flag Yes/No. Define if block will be selected for simulate process. Validation Rules Yes or No (default blank is No)
properties.name: FX_SELECTED

properties.documentation: Specifies the operator who is working on a Forex block of the scenario. Validation Rules No input field Automatically updated
properties.name: FX_OPERATOR

properties.documentation: Flag Yes/No. Define if block will not be clear by FOREX option in "clear.scenario" process. Validation Rules Yes or No (default blank is No)
properties.name: FX_LOCKED

properties.documentation: Identifies the nature of the Forex deal. The application handles two different types: - SP = Spot - FW = Forward Validation Rules 2 alpha characters deal type Only the above mentioned deal types will be accepted.
properties.name: FX_DEAL_TYPE

properties.documentation: Define direction of the forex. Validation Rules Mandatory. Must be the currency sold or the currency bought
properties.name: FX_LEAD_CCY

properties.documentation: Maturity date for the Forex deal. Validation Rules Standard T24 date
properties.name: FX_MATURITY

properties.documentation: Currency of the selling part of forex. Validation Rules Must be the currency of selling account.
properties.name: CURRENCY_SOLD

properties.documentation: Account code of the selling part of the forex. Validation Rules Valid account code.
properties.name: ACCOUNT_PAY

properties.documentation: Contains the amount of the currency being sold. If no value is entered, the amount will be calculated automatically by the system as explained in the Details. It is important to note that either the amount bought or amount sold must be entered. From this the other value can be calculated in the system's exchange rate routine. This routine can work in a number of ways: 1. If one amount and the exchange rate are entered, the routine calculates the other amount. 2. If both amounts are entered, the routine calculates the exchange rate. Validation Rules Standard T24 amount validation. The actual format depend on the currency.
properties.name: AMOUNT_SOLD

properties.documentation: Currency of the buying part of forex. Validation Rules Must be the currency of buying account.
properties.name: CURRENCY_BOUGHT

properties.documentation: Account code of the buying part of the forex. Validation Rules Valid account code.
properties.name: ACCOUNT_REC

properties.documentation: Contains the amount of the currency being purchased. If no value is entered, the amount will be calculated automatically by the system as explained in the Details. It is important to note that either the amount bought or amount sold must be entered. From this the other value can be calculated in the system's exchange rate routine. This routine can work in a number of ways: 1. If one amount and the exchange rate are entered, the routine calculates the other amount. 2. If both amounts are entered, the routine calculates the exchange rate. Validation Rules Standard T24 amount validation. The actual format depend on the currency.
properties.name: AMOUNT_BOUGHT

properties.documentation: Identifies the exchange rate between the currency bought and currency sold. It is important to note that either the amount bought or amount sold must be entered. From this the other value can be calculated in the system's exchange rate routine. This routine can work in a number of ways: 1. If one amount and the exchange rate are entered, the routine calculates the other amount. 2. If both amounts are entered, the routine calculates the exchange rate. Validation Rules Standard T24 rate validation.
properties.name: FX_EXCH_RATE

properties.documentation: Not used. Validation Rules Rule 1 Rule 2
properties.name: FX_ORDER

properties.documentation: Flag Yes/No. Define if block will be selected for simulate process. Validation Rules Yes or No (default blank is No)
properties.name: AC_SELECTED

properties.documentation: Specifies the operator who is working on an Account block of the scenario. Validation Rules No input field Automatically updated
properties.name: AC_OPERATOR

properties.documentation: Flag Yes/No. Define if block will not be clear by FLOW option in "clear.scenario" process. Validation Rules Yes or No (default blank is No)
properties.name: AC_LOCKED

properties.documentation: Define direction of the flow. Validation Rules Mandatory. Inflow/Outflow
properties.name: AC_DIRECTION

properties.documentation: Currency of the account involve in the flow. If set, system will proposed the default account when passing on the account field. Validation Rules Must be a valid currency.
properties.name: ACA_CURRENCY

properties.documentation: Account involve in the flow. Validation Rules Must be a valid account of specify portfolio.
properties.name: ACA_ACCOUNT

properties.documentation: Amount of the flow. Validation Rules Must be a valid amount. Positive numeric.
properties.name: ACA_VALUATION

properties.documentation: This field is no longer used.
properties.name: AC_ORDER

properties.documentation: Contains all the Override messages which the user agreed to during Input.In the event that the user confirms the Override, the full text of the actual Override Message will be stored, for reference purposes only, in this multivalue field.
properties.name: OVERRIDE

classes.documentation: After the generation of orders, all scenarios for which orders have been generated are moved to the AM.SCENARIO.SAVED file and deleted from the AM.SCENARIO file.
classes.name: AM_SCENARIO_SAVED

properties.documentation: Contains the amount of the currency being sold. If no value is entered, the amount will be calculated automatically by the system as explained in the Details. It is important to note that either the amount bought or amount sold must be entered. From this the other value can be calculated in the system's exchange rate routine. This routine can work in a number of ways: 1. If one amount and the exchange rate are entered, the routine calculates the other amount. 2. If both amounts are entered, the routine calculates the exchange rate. Validation Rules Standard T24 amount validation. The actual format depend on the currency.
properties.name: AMOUNT_SOLD

Validation Rules Standard T24 rate validation.
